name: 鋒利爪

effect.description: Lacerates the target, causing them to lose HP each turn for a short duration.

skillVisualPrompt: A single character-sized clawed limb performing a rapid downward diagonal slash followed by an immediate upward back-swipe. The claws are elongated and sharp with a polished chrome finish. The motion is extremely fast with sharp keyframes. Background is solid #00FF00.
sfxPrompt: A high-velocity metallic 'shink' sound with a dominant high-frequency friction layer, synchronized with a heavy, wet tearing mid-range texture and a subtle low-end thud to simulate the weight of the strike.
